# [Interview #460: TGS Signing Report - Meg Lurvey, Entry #29](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=460#29)

#### Meg Lurvey

Geoff, his wife, and his young son Luke drove seven hours from Ottawa, Canada to get their books signed.
